page.title: 15Assorted Local News.
page.content: Some clips from local newspapers... {THE DEADLY GAME.} Kids are risking life and limb at Abingdon's industrial estate by playing a deadly game trying to get a few broken toys from an incinerator. {FIREMEN RESCUE PETRA FROM DOG GUARD. Dog Petra got her head stuck in between a dog guard and owner John Grice had to call the fire brigade. {SUNDAY NIGHT STREAKERS. The new craze in Abingdon is people meeting at the junction of Broad St. and Stert St. and stripping off! {SIR GETS A SOAKING! Teacher Andrew Field got hit on the chin by wet sponges as he sat in the stocks at the John Mason School Fete. {STOP THIS DANGER NOW! Mums whose children's lives are in danger crossing the 60mph Drayton road want action taken now.
